author: Daemon Capital
title: Democratised AlgoTrading on Cardano
description: Classic blockchain rewards focus on market making fees, PoS rewards & lending, leaving a big revenue area of automated trading untapped.

author: Daemon Capital
title: DEX, Cardano Decentralized Exchange
description: Blockchain-agnostic decentralized exchange with liquidity staking and farming, crypto indexes, derivatives, mirrored assets, and daemons.

author: John Romano
title: smartstakepool.io
description: Stakepools have limited functionality for distro or rewards. It's very hard to teach the average joe in 123 how to delegate to a stake pool.

author: Daemon Capital
title: Viff.Club: Slimey Emotional NFTs
description: NFTs are just random and dull files. But, what if NFTs could be slimes? Be alive, independent, autonomous, emotional, and have live goals?

author: Team BitBunny.io
title: BitBunny.io: Adopt animals w/ NFT
description: NFTs are not being used to their fullest potential-- As a means to represent tangible real-world assets in the blockchain.

title: Wrap NTFs
description: There is a great opportunity to bring NTFS tokens to the DEFI market

title: Promptous Dental Benefits DApp
description: 82 million people in the US are without dental insurance, meaning they lack a way to afford dental procedures

title: Cardacity: a trading card game
description: There is a lack of casual apps/games built on Cardano which will be key in order to attract less technical crowds to the project.

title: Banking The Unbanked
description: 272M migrants around the world sending their hard earn 1.76T USD back home through underground remittance.

title: DApp to manage certifications
description: Anyone in the world should be able to store certifications obtained from training organizations in a secure, accesible and permanent manner.

description: Traditional art buyers & orgs. (museums/ galleries) don't have enough guidance to utilize NFT marketplaces leaving valuable art & buyers out

title: UnicornHire Recruitment Platform
description: There are a number of areas of dissatisfaction and risk within the recruitment process, ranging from **Bias, Data/ID security and Ghosting**

title: CardanoTales: CNFTs-based RPG game.
description: CNFT collectibles have seen a wide success in the Cardano community but although the appeal, they can not yet be implemented in games.

title: Ensuro: A Decentralized Insurance
description: Insurance is hardly present where most needed, as in developing countries, and is unavailable as an investment product for ordinary people.

title: NFTDOT.IO-enable adoption of NFT&FT
description: Adoption of assets tokenization, goods digital receipts, digital art, digital ownership transfer is met with technical and market barriers

\-Build a Ecosysteem Sport/Training App on Cardano Platform  
\-Making People Healthier  
\-Connecting ADA with Sport  
\-More addoption in Cyrpto/ADA

title: ALLIN Social Betting Platform
description:
$200B betting industry lacks trust.

Sportsbooks control odds so they win.

Social media allows sharing experiences but not trusted betting.

title: Cardano Connector (Metamask-like)
description: DeFi DApps require a web wallet to interact with (like Metamask)

title: Plant Me
description: Every farmer in America is forced to go to big banks for funding. And the average citizen is not allowed to invest in their local farms.

author: Louis

title: DubT contract-driven livestream NFT

title: MUSIC STARTUPS
description: Revenues of music industry amounts to $20 billion worldwide per year, but this money is not fairly distributed among bands, artists and fans

title: Mosaic: fNFT Native Token Mint

title: WooCommerce Payments Plugin

title: Smart Contract-Based Paper Wallets
description: Paper wallets are essential for growing Cardano, but security at point-of-sale is lacking.

title: ADALancer

title: Crowdano Crowdfunding Platform

author: Angus Gow
title: Insurance Claims Processing
description: Insurance fraud costs the UK around £1.3bn, applying dApps and tokenisation to the insurance process this could be greatly reduced.

title: WrapAssets.io

title: On-Chain Trust

title: Food Delivery App + Low Commissions
description: Uber Eats takes advantage of restaurants and delivery drivers with 30-60% commission fees.

author: ventup.io
title: Community Launchpad & DEX

title: DaPassword - a password manager

author: Matthew P
title: DEED IT FORWARD

title: RAY Wallet
description: Interacting with various cryptoservices requires a lot of different actions and movement of funds. It has to be in one place!

title: NFT for each CARDANO Smart Contract
description: Cardano needs to implement the NFTs to its technology and to Smart Financial Contracts of its MARLOWE platform to be a leader in said market

description: Musicians / crew can't track/recieve royalties and touring payments all over the world. Centralised systems have never changed since the 60s

title: Decentralized exchange on Cardano

title: Animal Conservation - NFT Rewards
description: Animals in Africa and other countries are being killed to extinction by poachers, climate change and deforestation.

title: Dapp to control/monetize your data
description: $300B surveillance capitalism market broke the customer relationship. People should control & benefit from the use of their personal data

title: Back to Basis - Tax compliance tool
description: Tax compliance obligations under US tax policy are difficult to track correctly, especially when on chain transactions are involved.

author: Dan C
title: Responsible Investing Dapp
description: Securing gains from crypto investments takes discipline, precision, and consistency. Something a lot of us lack in this space!

title: Cardano Support for Point of Sale

title: Decentralized Content Platform
description:
Content Platforms (Netflix) are making Billions as the profit as the middleman.  
Unfair rewarding for creators  
High fees for end users

title: Prepaid Debit Card
description: We can use QR codes to send ADA to each other, but can we buy a cup of coffee with ADA?

author: Aidan
title: PlayerMint P2: MetaVerse Toolkit
